official_title: To suspend for a 3-year period the duty on C.I. Pigment Red 242.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, for a three year period, the duty on 2-Naphlalene-carboxamide, N,N'-(2,5-dichloro-1,4- phenylene)bis(4-((2-chloro 5- (trifluroro- methyl)phenyl) azol-3-hydroxy (also known as C.I. pigment red 242).

titles.title: To suspend for a 3-year period the duty on C.I. Pigment Red 242.
